# semplifico gamma ed epsilon usando  pformula = ~ alba + temp + season
m6b.moddetection.mod1 <- colext(psiformula= ~ MDR + ottavi_veg + Esp.tr,
                               gammaformula = ~ factor(year) + factor(season) + time.interval -1,
